tha-ap325:0.3_0: held together by those senior monks.
tha-ap325:1.3_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
tha-ap325:1.4_0: when I’ve disposed of feces more.
tha-ap325:2.3_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
tha-ap325:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap325:3.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
tha-ap325:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap325:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhallika.
tha-ap325:6.1_0: A third part of the senior monks.
